description: A humorous take on Brazil's eternal summer vibe.
title: Eternal Summer
n_1: Pedro and Luana lounge on a sunny beach.
n_2: They laugh, enjoying the warm sun.
c1_2: Seriously, does winter exist in Brazil?
c2_2: Only between the sunshine and beach parties!
n_3: Pedro scans the beach, pretending to search.
n_4: Night falls; they dance at a beach party.
c2_4: With this vibe, it's summer all year!
